title: Enhancing Software Development Practical Competencies: Constructivist-Based Teacher Coaching and Mathematics Education Improvement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of mathematics pedagogy and coaching concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Three specific goals can be established to improve mathematics instruction using the constructivist coaching model.
Improvement strategies can be proposed through reflective inquiry into learning barriers encountered during the coaching process.
A sustainable culture of mathematics education improvement can be fostered by designing a collaborative feedback system with peer teachers.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
